@graph.name: Genetic Design (BASIC Assembly)
@graph.description:
Design plasmids encoding predicted pathways by using the BASIC assembly method.

## Associated Tutorial

This workflows is part of the tutorial [Designing plasmids encoding predicted pathways by using the BASIC assembly method](https://training.galaxyproject.org/training-material/topics/synthetic-biology/tutorials/basic_assembly_analysis/tutorial.html), available in the [GTN](https://training.galaxyproject.org)
